subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: ST. PAUL (AP) — The testament to Marian Gaborik’s talent is also the knock against his career so far: Think about how good he could be if he gave his all in every game.
snippet: ST. PAUL (AP) — The testament to Marian Gaborik’s talent is also the knock against his career so far: Think about how good he could be if he gave his all in every game.
